title: 劇場版 忍たま乱太郎 ドクタケ忍者隊最強の軍師

search.title: Nintama Rantaro the Movie: The Dokutake Ninja Team's Strongest Strategist
search.original_title: 劇場版 忍たま乱太郎 ドクタケ忍者隊最強の軍師
search.overview: The  movie centers on Rantaro's teacher Hansuke Doi losing a battle against Sonnamon and Zatto Konnamon becoming a teacher at Ninjutsu Academy.
